sources.title: The Little Brown Burro (1978)
sources.description: A sad little burro who feels that no one wants him and that he doesn't belong anywhere finds out differently when he is bought by Joseph to transport Mary on their travel to Jerusalem for the birth of Jesus. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-little-brown-burro-1978/

metadata.Plot: A sad little burro who feels that no one wants him and that he doesn't belong anywhere finds out differently when he is bought by Joseph to transport Mary on their travel to Jerusalem for the birth of Jesus.
metadata.Actors: Lorne Greene, Bonnie Brooks, Paul Soles
